Description_lang: An emissary from the Skyhorn tribe, Loren Stormhoof is a long-standing ally of the Unseen Path. His knowledge of the native flora and fauna is unsurpassed.
AuraDescription_lang: Loren Stormhoof is skilled in identifying plants and animals native to the Broken Isles.

description_blz.en_US: An emissary from the Skyhorn tribe, Loren Stormhoof is a long-standing ally of the Unseen Path. His knowledge of the native flora and fauna is unsurpassed.
description_blz.es_MX: Loren Pezuña Tempestuosa, emisario de la tribu Cuerno del Cielo, ha sido un aliado fiel de la Senda oculta. Su conocimiento de la flora y fauna nativas es insuperable.
description_blz.pt_BR: Loren Casco Feroz é um emissário da tribo Chifre Celeste e aliado de longa data do Caminho Oculto. O seu conhecimento da flora e fauna nativas é insuperável.
description_blz.de_DE: Loren Sturmhuf ist ein Abgesandter vom Stamm der Himmelshörner und seit langer Zeit ein treuer Verbündeter des Unsichtbaren Pfades. Sein Wissen über die lokale Flora und Fauna ist unübertroffen.
description_blz.en_GB: An emissary from the Skyhorn tribe, Loren Stormhoof is a long-standing ally of the Unseen Path. His knowledge of the native flora and fauna is unsurpassed.
description_blz.es_ES: Emisario de la tribu Cuerno del Cielo, Loren Pezuña Tempestuosa es un viejo aliado de la Senda Oculta. Sus conocimientos de la flora y la fauna nativas no tienen parangón.
description_blz.fr_FR: Émissaire de la tribu Corne-Céleste, Loren Sabot-Tempête est un allié de longue date du Sentier invisible. Sa connaissance de la faune et de la flore locales est inégalée.
description_blz.it_IT: Emissario della Tribù Corno Celeste, Loren Zoccolo Tempestoso è da sempre un alleato del Sentiero Invisibile. La sua conoscenza della flora e della fauna sono insuperate.
description_blz.ru_RU: Посланник племени Небесного Рога Лорен Штормовое Копыто – давний проверенный союзник Незримого пути. Никто лучше него не знаком с местной флорой и фауной.
description_blz.ko_KR: 하늘뿔 부족의 사절인 로렌 스톰후프는 드러나지 않은 길의 오랜 아군입니다. 그는 토종 동식물에 대해 누구보다 해박한 지식을 지니고 있습니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 洛倫‧風暴之蹄是來自天角部族的密使，長年以來一直是隱獵團的盟友。他對野生動植物的知識無人能及。
description_blz.zh_CN: 罗伦·雷蹄是来自天角部落的大使，长久以来他一直是隐秘通途的坚定盟友。他对当地的动植物的了解无人能及。
